title: Olumbe lwa Korona

summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

8.lts: Translated by Samson Wanyonyi Ngosia and Tobias Walubengo

9.lts: Translated by Samson Wanyonyi Ngosia and Tobias Walubengo

12.lts: Sibeleho buchwa esindu SILALA sia okhoyela omanye khuli ebirusi bia korona
12.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

13.lts: Sibeleho buchwa esindu SILALA sia okhoyela omanye khuli ebirusi bia korona
13.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

30.lts: Wasinjila sinaho ninaye. Sinaho sia ofulenje fubili silakhingilila amame okhutuukha wa oli.
30.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

31.lts: Wasinjila sinaho ninaye. Sinaho sia ofulenje fubili silakhingilila amame okhutuukha wa oli.
31.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

38.lts: Kho niiba mbo olengela omundu wulolekha ni alakhololanga/ alasimulanga/ naho omulwale onyala:
38.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

39.lts: Kho niiba mbo olengela omundu wulolekha ni alakhololanga/ alasimulanga/ naho omulwale onyala:
39.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

40.lts: Omuhelesie emasiki okhukhinga emunwa nende amolu. Anyala wakhololelamo naho wasimulilamo mani siakhingilila buli omundu wuli ahambi okhunyoola ebirusi.
40.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

41.lts: Omuhelesie emasiki okhukhinga emunwa nende amolu. Anyala wakhololelamo naho wasimulilamo mani siakhingilila buli omundu wuli ahambi okhunyoola ebirusi.
41.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

48.lts: Aundi sali omulwale ta, alekhinganga buchwa.
48.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

49.lts: Aundi sali omulwale ta, alekhinganga buchwa.
49.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

50.lts: Abandu balala bahambisibwa yilali sibechesianga mbo abalwale ta, nabuchwa banyala bahambia abandi obulwale.
50.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

51.lts: Abandu balala bahambisibwa yilali sibechesianga mbo abalwale ta, nabuchwa banyala bahambia abandi obulwale.
51.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

52.lts: Khandi bubeele obulayi okhulekha okhutubaana nende abandu mu ebituma, sikila somanya wina wunyala okhuba omulwale ta.
52.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

53.lts: Khandi bubeele obulayi okhulekha okhutubaana nende abandu mu ebituma, sikila somanya wina wunyala okhuba omulwale ta.
53.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

68.lts: Yakhaba elwanyi wa emasiki ya okhukhinga omunwa na amolu.
68.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

69.lts: Yakhaba elwanyi wa emasiki ya okhukhinga omunwa na amolu.
69.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

70.lts: Olupao lwa khu yingasi ya ekorofa

71.lts: Olupao lwa khu yingasi ya ekorofa

80.lts: Kakhaba kario, ofuse fundi amare ka omundu omulwale kanyala karoonya khu ofundu fundi khuli…
80.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

81.lts: Kakhaba kario, ofuse fundi amare ka omundu omulwale kanyala karoonya khu ofundu fundi khuli…
81.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

88.lts: Olatiila khu ofundu funo mani wichukhane otiile amoni wuwo,
88.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

89.lts: Olatiila khu ofundu funo mani wichukhane otiile amoni wuwo,
89.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

90.lts: Kho okhusinga ofundu funo nende esabuni naho amachi nende esikelo sia amalwa niyo yinjila yonyene ya okhurusiakho ebirusi bino.
90.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

91.lts: Kho okhusinga ofundu funo nende esabuni naho amachi nende esikelo sia amalwa niyo yinjila yonyene ya okhurusiakho ebirusi bino.
91.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

92.lts: Eburusi binyala biekhala khu ofundu khu ofuse ofurambi
92.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

93.lts: Eburusi binyala biekhala khu ofundu khu ofuse ofurambi
93.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

98.lts: Niko kakila nibuli obulayi okhulonda amakhuwa ka
98.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

99.lts: Niko kakila nibuli obulayi okhulonda amakhuwa ka
99.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

100.en: wash with soap up to here

101.en: wash with soap up to here

106.lts: Okhehabasia hamoni wuwo ta. (Naho hamoni wa omundu wundi ta.) Niiba mbo okhoya okhole kano, singa emikhono kikio nende esabuni obulayi bwene mbele.
106.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

107.lts: Okhehabasia hamoni wuwo ta. (Naho hamoni wa omundu wundi ta.) Niiba mbo okhoya okhole kano, singa emikhono kikio nende esabuni obulayi bwene mbele.
107.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

108.lts: Ofuse fwolana okwimba “Mwana wa mbeli” khabili
108.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

109.lts: Ofuse fwolana okwimba “Mwana wa mbeli” khabili
109.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

116.en: wash the back of your hands

117.en: wash the back of your hands

120.lts: Nikaba bari otililekho, okhahenda ta. Singa buchwa amakhono kaako nende esabuni.
120.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

121.lts: Nikaba bari otililekho, okhahenda ta. Singa buchwa amakhono kaako nende esabuni.
121.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

122.lts: Nikanyalikha okhatiila olubeka lwa elwanyi lwa emasiki ta.
122.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

123.lts: Nikanyalikha okhatiila olubeka lwa elwanyi lwa emasiki ta.
123.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

126.lts: Ebirusi bikhulunduanga olubeka lwa mukari lwa emasiki oleboha oluhono.
126.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

127.lts: Ebirusi bikhulunduanga olubeka lwa mukari lwa emasiki oleboha oluhono.
127.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

128.lts: Sukuna emasiki ya okhukhinga emunwa yilanyira. Okheboha emasiki okhubira yinyinga ndala ta.
128.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

129.lts: Sukuna emasiki ya okhukhinga emunwa yilanyira. Okheboha emasiki okhubira yinyinga ndala ta.
129.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

138.lts: Buli omundu abe nende etaulo yiye

139.lts: Buli omundu abe nende etaulo yiye

140.lts: Mukhasanga ofwakhulia khusililikho silala ta,naho ofukombe naho chitaulo ta.
140.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

141.lts: Mukhasanga ofwakhulia khusililikho silala ta,naho ofukombe naho chitaulo ta.
141.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

142.lts: Sonyala okhutiila hamoni wuwo nende yikhumbo ta ata wakhakhaka.
142.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

143.lts: Sonyala okhutiila hamoni wuwo nende yikhumbo ta ata wakhakhaka.
143.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

144.lts: Niwikula naho okhwikala olwiki rumikhila yikhumbo naho amabeka nikanyalikha, okharumikhila omukhono ta.
144.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

145.lts: Niwikula naho okhwikala olwiki rumikhila yikhumbo naho amabeka nikanyalikha, okharumikhila omukhono ta.
145.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

148.lts: Nende niwakharula elwanyi mu abandu abanyinji
148.en: and after being out in the public

149.lts: Nende niwakharula elwanyi mu abandu abanyinji
149.en: and after being out in the public

152.lts: Singa emikhono kikio buli khase nende esabuni….
152.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

153.lts: Singa emikhono kikio buli khase nende esabuni….
153.en: Always wash your hands with soap…
